text: The 1981 TAA Formula Ford Driver to Europe Series was an Australian motor racing competition for Formula Ford racing cars.Official Programme, Sandown, 11 to 13 September 1981 The series, which was the twelfth Australian Formula Ford Series,Australian 'Driver to Europe' Series, www.formulaford.com.au, as archived at web.archive.org was won by Phillip Revell driving a Lola T440.Australian Motor Racing Yearbook 1981/82, pages 136 to 139 ==Series schedule== Phillip Revell won the series driving a Lola T440, similar to the example pictured above The series was contested over eight rounds with one race per round. {| class="wikitable" generated with :de:Wikipedia:Helferlein/VBA-Macro for EXCEL tableconversion V1.7<\hiddentext> |- style="font-weight:bold" | align="center" | Round | Circuit | Date | Winning driver | Car |- | align="center" | 1 | Sandown |?? February | Phillip Revell | Lola T440 |- | align="center" | 2 | Calder |?? March | Phillip Revell | Lola T440 |- | align="center" | 3 | Amaroo Park |?? | Don Bretland | Van Diemen RF75 |- | align="center" | 4 | Adelaide International Raceway Programme, Adelaide International Raceway, 3rd May 1981 | 3 May | Jeff Summers | Elfin 620B |- | align="center" | 5 | Oran Park | 21 June | Phillip Revell | Lola T440 |- | align="center" | 6 | Amaroo Park | 9 August | Phillip Revell | Lola T440 |- | align="center" | 7 | Surfers Paradise | 20 August | Don Bretland | Van Diemen RF75 |- | align="center" | 8 | Sandown | 13 September | Phillip Revell | Lola T440 |} ==Points system== Points were awarded on a 20, 15, 12, 10, 8, 6, 4, 3, 2, 1 basis for the first ten places at each round. ==Series standings == {| class="wikitable" generated with :de:Wikipedia:Helferlein/VBA-Macro for EXCEL tableconversion V1.7<\hiddentext> |- style="font-weight:bold" | align="center" | Position 1981 TAA Formula Ford Driver to Europe Series, www.formulaford.com.au, as archived at web.archive.org | Driver | Car | Entrant | align="center" | San | align="center" | Cal | align="center" | Ama | align="center" | Ade | align="center" | Ora | align="center" | Ama | align="center" | Sur | align="center" | San | align="center" | Total |- | align="center" | 1 | Phillip Revell | Lola T440 | Bob Holden Motors | align="center" | 20 | align="center" | 20 | align="center" | 10 | align="center" | -
